00027 /*
00028  *  The cYAML tree is constructed as an n-tree.
00029  *  root -> cmd 1
00030  *          ||
00031  *          \/
00032  *          cmd 2 -> attr1 -> attr2
00033  *                              ||
00034  *                              \/
00035  *                            attr2.1 -> attr2.1.1 -> attr2.1.2
00036  */
00037 
00038 #include <yaml.h>
00039 #include <stdio.h>
00040 #include <string.h>
00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <math.h>
00043 #include <stdlib.h>
00044 #include <float.h>
00045 #include <limits.h>
00046 #include <ctype.h>
00047 #include "libcfs/list.h"
00048 #include "cyaml.h"
00049 
00050 #define INDENT          4
00051 #define EXTRA_IND       2
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * cYAML_print_info
00055  *   This structure contains print information
00056  *   required when printing the node
00057  */
00058 struct cYAML_print_info {
00059         int level;
00060         int array_first_elem;
00061         int extra_ind;
00062 };
00063 
00064 /*
00065  *  cYAML_ll
00066  *  Linked list of different trees representing YAML
00067  *  documents.
00068  */
00069 struct cYAML_ll {
00070         struct list_head list;
00071         struct cYAML *obj;
00072         struct cYAML_print_info *print_info;
00073 };
00074 
00075 static void print_value(FILE *f, struct list_head *stack);
00076 
00077 enum cYAML_handler_error {
00078         CYAML_ERROR_NONE = 0,
00079         CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE = -1,
00080         CYAML_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED = -2,
00081         CYAML_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEM = -3,
00082         CYAML_ERROR_BAD_VALUE = -4,
00083         CYAML_ERROR_PARSE = -5,
00084 };
00085 
00086 enum cYAML_tree_state {
00087         TREE_STATE_COMPLETE = 0,
00088         TREE_STATE_INITED,
00089         TREE_STATE_TREE_STARTED,
00090         TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED,
00091         TREE_STATE_KEY,
00092         TREE_STATE_KEY_FILLED,
00093         TREE_STATE_VALUE,
00094         TREE_STATE_SEQ_START,
00095 };
00096 
00097 struct cYAML_tree_node {
00098         struct cYAML *root;
00099         /* cur is the current node we're operating on */
00100         struct cYAML *cur;
00101         enum cYAML_tree_state state;
00102         int from_blk_map_start;
00103         /* represents the tree depth */
00104         struct list_head ll;
00105 };
00106 
00107 typedef enum cYAML_handler_error (*yaml_token_handler)(yaml_token_t *token,
00108                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *);
00109 
00110 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_parse_error(yaml_token_t *token,
00111                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00112 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_stream_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00113                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00114 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_stream_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00115                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00116 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_not_supported(yaml_token_t *token,
00117                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00118 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_document_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00119                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00120 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_document_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00121                                                struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00122 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_blk_seq_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00123                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00124 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_blk_mapping_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00125                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00126 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_block_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00127                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00128 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_key(yaml_token_t *token,
00129                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00130 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_value(yaml_token_t *token,
00131                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00132 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_scalar(yaml_token_t *token,
00133                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);
00134 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_entry_token(yaml_token_t *token,
00135                                         struct cYAML_tree_node *tree);

00137 /* dispatch table */
00138 static yaml_token_handler dispatch_tbl[] = {
00139         [YAML_NO_TOKEN] = yaml_parse_error,
00140         [YAML_STREAM_START_TOKEN] = yaml_stream_start,
00141         [YAML_STREAM_END_TOKEN] = yaml_stream_end,
00142         [YAML_VERSION_DIRECTIVE_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00143         [YAML_TAG_DIRECTIVE_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00144         [YAML_DOCUMENT_START_TOKEN] = yaml_document_start,
00145         [YAML_DOCUMENT_END_TOKEN] = yaml_document_end,
00146         [YAML_BLOCK_SEQUENCE_START_TOKEN] = yaml_blk_seq_start,
00147         [YAML_BLOCK_MAPPING_START_TOKEN] = yaml_blk_mapping_start,
00148         [YAML_BLOCK_END_TOKEN] = yaml_block_end,
00149         [YAML_FLOW_SEQUENCE_START_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00150         [YAML_FLOW_SEQUENCE_END_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00151         [YAML_FLOW_MAPPING_START_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00152         [YAML_FLOW_MAPPING_END_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00153         [YAML_BLOCK_ENTRY_TOKEN] = yaml_entry_token,
00154         [YAML_FLOW_ENTRY_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00155         [YAML_KEY_TOKEN] = yaml_key,
00156         [YAML_VALUE_TOKEN] = yaml_value,
00157         [YAML_ALIAS_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00158         [YAML_ANCHOR_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00159         [YAML_TAG_TOKEN] = yaml_not_supported,
00160         [YAML_SCALAR_TOKEN] = yaml_scalar,
00161 };

00163 static void cYAML_ll_free(struct list_head *ll)
00164 {
00165         struct cYAML_ll *node, *tmp;
00166 
00167         list_for_each_entry_safe(node, tmp, ll, list) {
00168                 free(node->print_info);
00169                 free(node);
00170         }
00171 }
00172 
00173 static int cYAML_ll_push(struct cYAML *obj,
00174                          const struct cYAML_print_info *print_info,
00175                          struct list_head *list)
00176 {
00177         struct cYAML_ll *node = calloc(1, sizeof(*node));
00178         if (node == NULL)
00179                 return -1;
00180 
00181         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&node->list);
00182 
00183         if (print_info) {
00184                 node->print_info = calloc(1, sizeof(*print_info));
00185                 if (node->print_info == NULL) {
00186                         free(node);
00187                         return -1;
00188                 }
00189                 *node->print_info = *print_info;
00190         }
00191         node->obj = obj;
00192 
00193         list_add(&node->list, list);
00194 
00195         return 0;
00196 }
00197 
00198 static struct cYAML *cYAML_ll_pop(struct list_head *list,
00199                                   struct cYAML_print_info **print_info)
00200 {
00201         struct cYAML_ll *pop;
00202         struct cYAML *obj = NULL;
00203 
00204         if (!list_empty(list)) {
00205                 pop = list_entry(list->next, struct cYAML_ll, list);
00206 
00207                 obj = pop->obj;
00208                 if (print_info != NULL)
00209                         *print_info = pop->print_info;
00210                 list_del(&pop->list);
00211 
00212                 if (print_info == NULL)
00213                         free(pop->print_info);
00214 
00215                 free(pop);
00216         }
00217         return obj;
00218 }
00219 
00220 static int cYAML_ll_count(struct list_head *ll)
00221 {
00222         int i = 0;
00223         struct list_head *node;
00224 
00225         list_for_each(node, ll)
00226                 i++;
00227 
00228         return i;
00229 }
00230 
00231 static int cYAML_tree_init(struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00232 {
00233         struct cYAML *obj = NULL, *cur = NULL;
00234 
00235         if (tree == NULL)
00236                 return -1;
00237 
00238         obj = calloc(1, sizeof(*obj));
00239         if (obj == NULL)
00240                 return -1;
00241 
00242         if (tree->root) {
00243                 /* append the node */
00244                 cur = tree->root;
00245                 while (cur->cy_next != NULL)
00246                         cur = cur->cy_next;
00247                 cur->cy_next = obj;
00248         } else {
00249                 tree->root = obj;
00250         }
00251 
00252         obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT;
00253 
00254         tree->cur = obj;
00255         tree->state = TREE_STATE_COMPLETE;
00256 
00257         /* free it and start anew */
00258         if (!list_empty(&tree->ll))
00259                 cYAML_ll_free(&tree->ll);
00260 
00261         return 0;
00262 }
00263 
00264 static struct cYAML *create_child(struct cYAML *parent)
00265 {
00266         struct cYAML *obj;
00267 
00268         if (parent == NULL)
00269                 return NULL;
00270 
00271         obj = calloc(1, sizeof(*obj));
00272         if (obj == NULL)
00273                 return NULL;
00274 
00275         /* set the type to OBJECT and let the value change that */
00276         obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT;
00277 
00278         parent->cy_child = obj;
00279 
00280         return obj;
00281 }
00282 
00283 static struct cYAML *create_sibling(struct cYAML *sibling)
00284 {
00285         struct cYAML *obj;
00286 
00287         if (sibling == NULL)
00288                 return NULL;
00289 
00290         obj = calloc(1, sizeof(*obj));
00291         if (obj == NULL)
00292                 return NULL;
00293 
00294         /* set the type to OBJECT and let the value change that */
00295         obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT;
00296 
00297         sibling->cy_next = obj;
00298         obj->cy_prev = sibling;
00299 
00300         return obj;
00301 }
00302 
00303 /* Parse the input text to generate a number,
00304  * and populate the result into item. */
00305 static bool parse_number(struct cYAML *item, const char *input)
00306 {
00307         double n = 0, sign = 1, scale = 0;
00308         int subscale = 0, signsubscale = 1;
00309         const char *num = input;
00310 
00311         if (*num == '-') {
00312                 sign = -1;
00313                 num++;
00314         }
00315 
00316         if (*num == '0')
00317                 num++;
00318 
00319         if (*num >= '1' && *num <= '9') {
00320                 do {
00321                         n = (n * 10.0) + (*num++ - '0');
00322                 } while (*num >= '0' && *num <= '9');
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (*num == '.' && num[1] >= '0' && num[1] <= '9') {
00326                 num++;
00327                 do {
00328                         n = (n * 10.0) + (*num++ - '0');
00329                         scale--;
00330                 } while (*num >= '0' && *num <= '9');
00331         }
00332 
00333         if (*num == 'e' || *num == 'E') {
00334                 num++;
00335                 if (*num == '+') {
00336                         num++;
00337                 } else if (*num == '-') {
00338                         signsubscale = -1;
00339                         num++;
00340                 }
00341                 while (*num >= '0' && *num <= '9')
00342                         subscale = (subscale * 10) + (*num++ - '0');
00343         }
00344 
00345         /* check to see if the entire string is consumed.  If not then
00346          * that means this is a string with a number in it */
00347         if (num != (input + strlen(input)))
00348                 return false;
00349 
00350         /* number = +/- number.fraction * 10^+/- exponent */
00351         n = sign * n * pow(10.0, (scale + subscale * signsubscale));
00352 
00353         item->cy_valuedouble = n;
00354         item->cy_valueint = (int)n;
00355         item->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_NUMBER;
00356 
00357         return true;
00358 }
00359 
00360 static int assign_type_value(struct cYAML *obj, const char *value)
00361 {
00362         if (value == NULL)
00363                 return -1;
00364 
00365         if (strcmp(value, "null") == 0)
00366                 obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_NULL;
00367         else if (strcmp(value, "false") == 0) {
00368                 obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_FALSE;
00369                 obj->cy_valueint = 0;
00370         } else if (strcmp(value, "true") == 0) {
00371                 obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_TRUE;
00372                 obj->cy_valueint = 1;
00373         } else if (*value == '-' || (*value >= '0' && *value <= '9')) {
00374                 if (parse_number(obj, value) == 0) {
00375                         obj->cy_valuestring = strdup(value);
00376                         obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_STRING;
00377                 }
00378         } else {
00379                 obj->cy_valuestring = strdup(value);
00380                 obj->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_STRING;
00381         }
00382 
00383         return 0;
00384 }
00385 
00386 /*
00387  * yaml_handle_token
00388  *  Builds the YAML tree rpresentation as the tokens are passed in
00389  *
00390  *  if token == STREAM_START && tree_state != COMPLETE
00391  *    something wrong. fail.
00392  *  else tree_state = INITIED
00393  *  if token == DOCUMENT_START && tree_state != COMPLETE || INITED
00394  *    something wrong, fail.
00395  *  else tree_state = TREE_STARTED
00396  *  if token == DOCUMENT_END
00397  *    tree_state = INITED if no STREAM START, else tree_state = COMPLETE
00398  *    erase everything on ll
00399  *  if token == STREAM_END && tree_state != INITED
00400  *    something wrong fail.
00401  *  else tree_state = COMPLETED
00402  *  if token == YAML_KEY_TOKEN && state != TREE_STARTED
00403  *    something wrong, fail.
00404  *  if token == YAML_SCALAR_TOKEN && state != KEY || VALUE
00405  *    fail.
00406  *  else if tree_state == KEY
00407  *     create a new sibling under the current head of the ll (if ll is
00408  *     empty insert the new node there and it becomes the root.)
00409  *    add the scalar value in the "string"
00410  *    tree_state = KEY_FILLED
00411  *  else if tree_state == VALUE
00412  *    try and figure out whether this is a double, int or string and store
00413  *    it appropriately
00414  *    state = TREE_STARTED
00415  * else if token == YAML_BLOCK_MAPPING_START_TOKEN && tree_state != VALUE
00416  *   fail
00417  * else push the current node on the ll && state = TREE_STARTED
00418  * if token == YAML_BLOCK_END_TOKEN && state != TREE_STARTED
00419  *   fail.
00420  * else pop the current token off the ll and make it the cur
00421  * if token == YAML_VALUE_TOKEN && state != KEY_FILLED
00422  *   fail.
00423  * else state = VALUE
00424  *
00425  */
00426 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_parse_error(yaml_token_t *token,
00427                                                  struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00428 {
00429         return CYAML_ERROR_PARSE;
00430 }
00431 
00432 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_stream_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00433                                                   struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00434 {
00435         enum cYAML_handler_error rc;
00436 
00437         /* with each new stream initialize a new tree */
00438         rc = cYAML_tree_init(tree);
00439 
00440         if (rc != CYAML_ERROR_NONE)
00441                 return rc;
00442 
00443         tree->state = TREE_STATE_INITED;
00444 
00445         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00446 }
00447 
00448 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_stream_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00449                                                 struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00450 {
00451         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_TREE_STARTED &&
00452             tree->state != TREE_STATE_COMPLETE)
00453                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00454 
00455         tree->state = TREE_STATE_INITED;
00456 
00457         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00458 }
00459 
00460 static enum cYAML_handler_error
00461 yaml_document_start(yaml_token_t *token, struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00462 {
00463         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_INITED)
00464                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00465 
00466         /* go to started state since we're expecting more tokens to come */
00467         tree->state = TREE_STATE_TREE_STARTED;
00468 
00469         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00470 }
00471 
00472 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_document_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00473                                                   struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00474 {
00475         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_COMPLETE)
00476                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00477 
00478         tree->state = TREE_STATE_TREE_STARTED;
00479 
00480         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00481 }
00482 
00483 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_key(yaml_token_t *token,
00484                                          struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00485 {
00486         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED &&
00487             tree->state != TREE_STATE_VALUE)
00488                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00489 
00490         if (tree->from_blk_map_start == 0 ||
00491             tree->state == TREE_STATE_VALUE)
00492                 tree->cur = create_sibling(tree->cur);
00493 
00494         tree->from_blk_map_start = 0;
00495 
00496         tree->state = TREE_STATE_KEY;
00497 
00498         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00499 }
00500 
00501 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_scalar(yaml_token_t *token,
00502                                             struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00503 {
00504         if (tree->state == TREE_STATE_KEY) {
00505                 /* assign the scalar value to the key that was created */
00506                 tree->cur->cy_string =
00507                   strdup((const char *)token->data.scalar.value);
00508 
00509                 tree->state = TREE_STATE_KEY_FILLED;
00510         } else if (tree->state == TREE_STATE_VALUE) {
00511                 if (assign_type_value(tree->cur,
00512                                       (char *)token->data.scalar.value))
00513                         /* failed to assign a value */
00514                         return CYAML_ERROR_BAD_VALUE;
00515                 tree->state = TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED;
00516         } else {
00517                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00518         }
00519 
00520         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00521 }
00522 
00523 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_value(yaml_token_t *token,
00524                                            struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00525 {
00526         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_KEY_FILLED)
00527                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00528 
00529         tree->state = TREE_STATE_VALUE;
00530 
00531         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00532 }
00533 
00534 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_blk_seq_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00535                                                    struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00536 {
00537         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_VALUE)
00538                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00539 
00540         /* Since a sequenc start event determines that this is the start
00541          * of an array, then that means the current node we're at is an
00542          * array and we need to flag it as such */
00543         tree->cur->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY;
00544         tree->state = TREE_STATE_SEQ_START;
00545 
00546         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00547 }
00548 
00549 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_entry_token(yaml_token_t *token,
00550                                                  struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00551 {
00552         struct cYAML *obj;
00553 
00554         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_SEQ_START &&
00555             tree->state != TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED)
00556                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00557 
00558         if (tree->state == TREE_STATE_SEQ_START) {
00559                 obj = create_child(tree->cur);
00560 
00561                 if (cYAML_ll_push(tree->cur, NULL, &tree->ll))
00562                         return CYAML_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEM;
00563 
00564                 tree->cur = obj;
00565         } else {
00566                 tree->cur = create_sibling(tree->cur);
00567                 tree->state = TREE_STATE_SEQ_START;
00568         }
00569 
00570         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00571 }
00572 
00573 static enum cYAML_handler_error
00574 yaml_blk_mapping_start(yaml_token_t *token,
00575                        struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00576 {
00577         struct cYAML *obj;
00578 
00579         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_VALUE &&
00580             tree->state != TREE_STATE_INITED &&
00581             tree->state != TREE_STATE_SEQ_START &&
00582             tree->state != TREE_STATE_TREE_STARTED)
00583                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00584 
00585         /* block_mapping_start means we're entering another block
00586          * indentation, so we need to go one level deeper
00587          * create a child of cur */
00588         obj = create_child(tree->cur);
00589 
00590         /* push cur on the stack */
00591         if (cYAML_ll_push(tree->cur, NULL, &tree->ll))
00592                 return CYAML_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEM;
00593 
00594         /* adding the new child to cur */
00595         tree->cur = obj;
00596 
00597         tree->state = TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED;
00598 
00599         tree->from_blk_map_start = 1;
00600 
00601         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00602 }
00603 
00604 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_block_end(yaml_token_t *token,
00605                                                struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00606 {
00607         if (tree->state != TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED &&
00608             tree->state != TREE_STATE_VALUE)
00609                 return CYAML_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE;
00610 
00611         tree->cur = cYAML_ll_pop(&tree->ll, NULL);
00612 
00613         /* if you have popped all the way to the top level, then move to
00614          * the complete state. */
00615         if (cYAML_ll_count(&tree->ll) == 0)
00616                 tree->state = TREE_STATE_COMPLETE;
00617         else if (tree->state == TREE_STATE_VALUE)
00618                 tree->state = TREE_STATE_BLK_STARTED;
00619 
00620         return CYAML_ERROR_NONE;
00621 }
00622 
00623 static enum cYAML_handler_error yaml_not_supported(yaml_token_t *token,
00624                                                    struct cYAML_tree_node *tree)
00625 {
00626         return CYAML_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00627 }
00628 
00629 static bool clean_usr_data(struct cYAML *node, void *usr_data, void **out)
00630 {
00631         cYAML_user_data_free_cb free_cb = usr_data;
00632 
00633         if (free_cb && node && node->cy_user_data) {
00634                 free_cb(node->cy_user_data);
00635                 node->cy_user_data = NULL;
00636         }
00637 
00638         return true;
00639 }
00640 
00641 static bool free_node(struct cYAML *node, void *user_data, void **out)
00642 {
00643         if (node)
00644                 free(node);
00645 
00646         return true;
00647 }
00648 
00649 static bool find_obj_iter(struct cYAML *node, void *usr_data, void **out)
00650 {
00651         char *name = usr_data;
00652 
00653         if (node != NULL && node->cy_string != NULL &&
00654             strcmp(node->cy_string, name) == 0) {
00655                 *out = node;
00656                 return false;
00657         }
00658 
00659         return true;
00660 }
00661 
00662 struct cYAML *cYAML_get_object_item(struct cYAML *parent, const char *name)
00663 {
00664         struct cYAML *node;
00665 
00666         if (parent == NULL || parent->cy_child == NULL || name == NULL)
00667                 return NULL;
00668 
00669         node = parent->cy_child;
00670 
00671         while (node != NULL &&
00672                 strcmp(node->cy_string, name) != 0) {
00673                 node = node->cy_next;
00674         }
00675 
00676         return node;
00677 }
00678 
00679 struct cYAML *cYAML_get_next_seq_item(struct cYAML *seq, struct cYAML **itm)
00680 {
00681         if (*itm != NULL && (*itm)->cy_next != NULL) {
00682                 *itm = (*itm)->cy_next;
00683                 return *itm;
00684         }
00685 
00686         if (*itm == NULL && seq->cy_type == CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY) {
00687                 *itm = seq->cy_child;
00688                 return *itm;
00689         }
00690 
00691         return NULL;
00692 }
00693 
00694 bool cYAML_is_sequence(struct cYAML *node)
00695 {
00696         return (node != NULL ? node->cy_type == CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY : 0);
00697 }
00698 
00699 void cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(struct cYAML *node, cYAML_walk_cb cb,
00700                                       bool cb_first,
00701                                       void *usr_data,
00702                                       void **out)
00703 {
00704         if (node == NULL)
00705                 return;
00706 
00707         if (cb_first) {
00708                 if (!cb(node, usr_data, out))
00709                         return;
00710         }
00711 
00712         if (node->cy_child)
00713                 cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(node->cy_child, cb,
00714                                           cb_first, usr_data, out);
00715 
00716         if (node->cy_next)
00717                 cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(node->cy_next, cb,
00718                                           cb_first, usr_data, out);
00719 
00720         if (!cb_first) {
00721                 if (!cb(node, usr_data, out))
00722                         return;
00723         }
00724 }
00725 
00726 struct cYAML *cYAML_find_object(struct cYAML *root, const char *name)
00727 {
00728         struct cYAML *found = NULL;
00729 
00730         cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(root, find_obj_iter, true,
00731                                   (void *)name, (void **)&found);
00732 
00733         return found;
00734 }
00735 
00736 void cYAML_clean_usr_data(struct cYAML *node, cYAML_user_data_free_cb free_cb)
00737 {
00738         cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(node, clean_usr_data, false, free_cb, NULL);
00739 }
00740 
00741 void cYAML_free_tree(struct cYAML *node)
00742 {
00743         cYAML_tree_recursive_walk(node, free_node, false, NULL, NULL);
00744 }
00745 
00746 static inline void print_simple(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node,
00747                                 struct cYAML_print_info *cpi)
00748 {
00749         int level = cpi->level;
00750         int ind = cpi->extra_ind;
00751 
00752         if (cpi->array_first_elem)
00753                 fprintf(f, "%*s- ", INDENT * level, "");
00754 
00755         fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %d\n", (cpi->array_first_elem) ? 0 :
00756                 INDENT * level + ind, "", node->cy_string,
00757                 node->cy_valueint);
00758 }
00759 
00760 static void print_string(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node,
00761                          struct cYAML_print_info *cpi)
00762 {
00763         char *new_line;
00764         int level = cpi->level;
00765         int ind = cpi->extra_ind;
00766 
00767         if (cpi->array_first_elem)
00768                 fprintf(f, "%*s- ", INDENT * level, "");
00769 
00770         new_line = strchr(node->cy_valuestring, '\n');
00771         if (new_line == NULL)
00772                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %s\n", (cpi->array_first_elem) ?
00773                         0 : INDENT * level + ind, "",
00774                         node->cy_string, node->cy_valuestring);
00775         else {
00776                 int indent = 0;
00777                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: ", (cpi->array_first_elem) ?
00778                         0 : INDENT * level + ind, "",
00779                         node->cy_string);
00780                 char *l = node->cy_valuestring;
00781                 while (new_line) {
00782                         *new_line = '\0';
00783                         fprintf(f, "%*s""%s\n", indent, "", l);
00784                         indent = INDENT * level + ind +
00785                                   strlen(node->cy_string) + 2;
00786                         *new_line = '\n';
00787                         l = new_line+1;
00788                         new_line = strchr(l, '\n');
00789                 }
00790                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s\n", indent, "", l);
00791         }
00792 }
00793 
00794 static void print_number(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node,
00795                          struct cYAML_print_info *cpi)
00796 {
00797         double d = node->cy_valuedouble;
00798         int level = cpi->level;
00799         int ind = cpi->extra_ind;
00800 
00801         if (cpi->array_first_elem)
00802                 fprintf(f, "%*s- ", INDENT * level, "");
00803 
00804         if ((fabs(((double)node->cy_valueint) - d) <= DBL_EPSILON) &&
00805             (d <= INT_MAX) && (d >= INT_MIN))
00806                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %d\n", (cpi->array_first_elem) ? 0 :
00807                         INDENT * level + ind, "",
00808                         node->cy_string, node->cy_valueint);
00809         else {
00810                 if ((fabs(floor(d) - d) <= DBL_EPSILON) &&
00811                     (fabs(d) < 1.0e60))
00812                         fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %.0f\n",
00813                                 (cpi->array_first_elem) ? 0 :
00814                                 INDENT * level + ind, "",
00815                                 node->cy_string, d);
00816                 else if ((fabs(d) < 1.0e-6) || (fabs(d) > 1.0e9))
00817                         fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %e\n",
00818                                 (cpi->array_first_elem) ? 0 :
00819                                 INDENT * level + ind, "",
00820                                 node->cy_string, d);
00821                 else
00822                         fprintf(f, "%*s""%s: %f\n",
00823                                 (cpi->array_first_elem) ? 0 :
00824                                 INDENT * level + ind, "",
00825                                 node->cy_string, d);
00826         }
00827 }
00828 
00829 static void print_object(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node,
00830                          struct list_head *stack,
00831                          struct cYAML_print_info *cpi)
00832 {
00833         struct cYAML_print_info print_info;
00834         struct cYAML *child = node->cy_child;
00835 
00836         if (node->cy_string != NULL)
00837                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s%s:\n", (cpi->array_first_elem) ?
00838                         INDENT * cpi->level :
00839                         INDENT * cpi->level + cpi->extra_ind,
00840                         "", (cpi->array_first_elem) ? "- " : "",
00841                         node->cy_string);
00842 
00843         print_info.level = (node->cy_string != NULL) ? cpi->level + 1 :
00844           cpi->level;
00845         print_info.array_first_elem = (node->cy_string == NULL) ?
00846           cpi->array_first_elem : 0;
00847         print_info.extra_ind = (cpi->array_first_elem) ? EXTRA_IND :
00848           cpi->extra_ind;
00849 
00850         while (child) {
00851                 if (cYAML_ll_push(child, &print_info, stack) != 0)
00852                         return;
00853                 print_value(f, stack);
00854                 print_info.array_first_elem = 0;
00855                 child = child->cy_next;
00856         }
00857 }
00858 
00859 static void print_array(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node,
00860                         struct list_head *stack,
00861                         struct cYAML_print_info *cpi)
00862 {
00863         struct cYAML_print_info print_info;
00864         struct cYAML *child = node->cy_child;
00865 
00866         if (node->cy_string != NULL) {
00867                 fprintf(f, "%*s""%s:\n", INDENT * cpi->level + cpi->extra_ind,
00868                         "", node->cy_string);
00869         }
00870 
00871         print_info.level = (node->cy_string != NULL) ? cpi->level + 1 :
00872           cpi->level;
00873         print_info.array_first_elem =  1;
00874         print_info.extra_ind = EXTRA_IND;
00875 
00876         while (child) {
00877                 if (cYAML_ll_push(child, &print_info, stack) != 0)
00878                         return;
00879                 print_value(f, stack);
00880                 child = child->cy_next;
00881         }
00882 }
00883 
00884 static void print_value(FILE *f, struct list_head *stack)
00885 {
00886         struct cYAML_print_info *cpi = NULL;
00887         struct cYAML *node = cYAML_ll_pop(stack, &cpi);
00888 
00889         if (node == NULL)
00890                 return;
00891 
00892         switch (node->cy_type) {
00893         case CYAML_TYPE_FALSE:
00894         case CYAML_TYPE_TRUE:
00895         case CYAML_TYPE_NULL:
00896                 print_simple(f, node, cpi);
00897                 break;
00898         case CYAML_TYPE_STRING:
00899                 print_string(f, node, cpi);
00900                 break;
00901         case CYAML_TYPE_NUMBER:
00902                 print_number(f, node, cpi);
00903                 break;
00904         case CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY:
00905                 print_array(f, node, stack, cpi);
00906                 break;
00907         case CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT:
00908                 print_object(f, node, stack, cpi);
00909                 break;
00910         default:
00911         break;
00912         }
00913 
00914         if (cpi != NULL)
00915                 free(cpi);
00916 }
00917 
00918 void cYAML_print_tree(struct cYAML *node)
00919 {
00920         struct cYAML_print_info print_info;
00921         struct list_head list;
00922 
00923         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&list);
00924 
00925         if (node == NULL)
00926                 return;
00927 
00928         memset(&print_info, 0, sizeof(struct cYAML_print_info));
00929 
00930         if (cYAML_ll_push(node, &print_info, &list) == 0)
00931                 print_value(stdout, &list);
00932 }
00933 
00934 void cYAML_print_tree2file(FILE *f, struct cYAML *node)
00935 {
00936         struct cYAML_print_info print_info;
00937         struct list_head list;
00938 
00939         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&list);
00940 
00941         if (node == NULL)
00942                 return;
00943 
00944         memset(&print_info, 0, sizeof(struct cYAML_print_info));
00945 
00946         if (cYAML_ll_push(node, &print_info, &list) == 0)
00947                 print_value(f, &list);
00948 }
00949 
00950 static struct cYAML *insert_item(struct cYAML *parent, char *key,
00951                                  enum cYAML_object_type type)
00952 {
00953         struct cYAML *node = calloc(1, sizeof(*node));
00954 
00955         if (node == NULL)
00956                 return NULL;
00957 
00958         if (key != NULL)
00959                 node->cy_string = strdup(key);
00960 
00961         node->cy_type = type;
00962 
00963         cYAML_insert_child(parent, node);
00964 
00965         return node;
00966 }
00967 
00968 struct cYAML *cYAML_create_seq(struct cYAML *parent, char *key)
00969 {
00970         return insert_item(parent, key, CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY);
00971 }
00972 
00973 struct cYAML *cYAML_create_seq_item(struct cYAML *seq)
00974 {
00975         return insert_item(seq, NULL, CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT);
00976 }
00977 
00978 struct cYAML *cYAML_create_object(struct cYAML *parent, char *key)
00979 {
00980         return insert_item(parent, key, CYAML_TYPE_OBJECT);
00981 }
00982 
00983 struct cYAML *cYAML_create_string(struct cYAML *parent, char *key, char *value)
00984 {
00985         struct cYAML *node = calloc(1, sizeof(*node));
00986         if (node == NULL)
00987                 return NULL;
00988 
00989         node->cy_string = strdup(key);
00990         node->cy_valuestring = strdup(value);
00991         node->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_STRING;
00992 
00993         cYAML_insert_child(parent, node);
00994 
00995         return node;
00996 }
00997 
00998 struct cYAML *cYAML_create_number(struct cYAML *parent, char *key, double value)
00999 {
01000         struct cYAML *node = calloc(1, sizeof(*node));
01001         if (node == NULL)
01002                 return NULL;
01003 
01004         node->cy_string = strdup(key);
01005         node->cy_valuedouble = value;
01006         node->cy_valueint = (int)value;
01007         node->cy_type = CYAML_TYPE_NUMBER;
01008 
01009         cYAML_insert_child(parent, node);
01010 
01011         return node;
01012 }
01013 
01014 void cYAML_insert_child(struct cYAML *parent, struct cYAML *node)
01015 {
01016         struct cYAML *cur;
01017 
01018         if (parent && node) {
01019                 if (parent->cy_child == NULL) {
01020                         parent->cy_child = node;
01021                         return;
01022                 }
01023 
01024                 cur = parent->cy_child;
01025 
01026                 while (cur->cy_next)
01027                         cur = cur->cy_next;
01028 
01029                 cur->cy_next = node;
01030                 node->cy_prev = cur;
01031         }
01032 }
01033 
01034 void cYAML_insert_sibling(struct cYAML *root, struct cYAML *sibling)
01035 {
01036         struct cYAML *last = NULL;
01037         if (root == NULL || sibling == NULL)
01038                 return;
01039 
01040         last = root;
01041         while (last->cy_next != NULL)
01042                 last = last->cy_next;
01043 
01044         last->cy_next = sibling;
01045 }
01046 
01047 void cYAML_build_error(int rc, int seq_no, char *cmd,
01048                        char *entity, char *err_str,
01049                        struct cYAML **root)
01050 {
01051         struct cYAML *r = NULL, *err, *s, *itm, *cmd_obj;
01052         if (root == NULL)
01053                 return;
01054 
01055         /* add to the tail of the root that's passed in */
01056         if ((*root) == NULL) {
01057                 *root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
01058                 if ((*root) == NULL)
01059                         goto failed;
01060         }
01061 
01062         r = *root;
01063 
01064         /* look for the command */
01065         cmd_obj = cYAML_get_object_item(r, (const char *)cmd);
01066         if (cmd_obj != NULL && cmd_obj->cy_type == CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY)
01067                 itm = cYAML_create_seq_item(cmd_obj);
01068         else if (cmd_obj == NULL) {
01069                 s = cYAML_create_seq(r, cmd);
01070                 itm = cYAML_create_seq_item(s);
01071         } else if (cmd_obj != NULL && cmd_obj->cy_type != CYAML_TYPE_ARRAY)
01072                 goto failed;
01073 
01074         err = cYAML_create_object(itm, entity);
01075         if (err == NULL)
01076                 goto failed;
01077 
01078         if (seq_no >= 0 &&
01079             cYAML_create_number(err, "seq_no", seq_no) == NULL)
01080                 goto failed;
01081 
01082         if (cYAML_create_number(err, "errno", rc) == NULL)
01083                 goto failed;
01084 
01085         if (cYAML_create_string(err, "descr", err_str) == NULL)
01086                 goto failed;
01087 
01088         return;
01089 
01090 failed:
01091         /* Only reason we get here is if we run out of memory */
01092         cYAML_free_tree(r);
01093         r = NULL;
01094         fprintf(stderr, "error:\n\tfatal: out of memory\n");
01095 }
01096 
01097 struct cYAML *cYAML_build_tree(char *yaml_file,
01098                                const char *yaml_blk,
01099                                size_t yaml_blk_size,
01100                                struct cYAML **err_rc)
01101 {
01102         yaml_parser_t parser;
01103         yaml_token_t token;
01104         struct cYAML_tree_node tree;
01105         enum cYAML_handler_error rc;
01106         yaml_token_type_t token_type;
01107         char err_str[256];
01108         FILE *input = NULL;
01109         int done = 0;
01110 
01111         memset(&tree, 0, sizeof(struct cYAML_tree_node));
01112 
01113         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tree.ll);
01114 
01115         /* Create the Parser object. */
01116         yaml_parser_initialize(&parser);
01117 
01118         /* file always takes precedence */
01119         if (yaml_file != NULL) {
01120                 /* Set a file input. */
01121                 input = fopen(yaml_file, "rb");
01122                 if (input == NULL) {
01123                         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str),
01124                                 "Failed to open file: %s", yaml_file);
01125                         cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "yaml", "builder",
01126                                           err_str,
01127                                           err_rc);
01128                         return NULL;
01129                 }
01130 
01131                 yaml_parser_set_input_file(&parser, input);
01132         } else if (yaml_blk != NULL) {
01133                 yaml_parser_set_input_string(&parser,
01134                                              (const unsigned char *) yaml_blk,
01135                                              yaml_blk_size);
01136         } else
01137                 /* assume that we're getting our input froms stdin */
01138                 yaml_parser_set_input_file(&parser, stdin);
01139 
01140         /* Read the event sequence. */
01141         while (!done) {
01142                 /*
01143                 * Go through the parser and build a cYAML representation
01144                 * of the passed in YAML text
01145                 */
01146                 yaml_parser_scan(&parser, &token);
01147 
01148                 rc = dispatch_tbl[token.type](&token, &tree);
01149                 if (rc != CYAML_ERROR_NONE) {
01150                         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str),
01151                                 "Failed to handle token:%d "
01152                                 "[state=%d, rc=%d]",
01153                                 token.type, tree.state, rc);
01154                         cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "yaml", "builder",
01155                                           err_str,
01156                                           err_rc);
01157                 }
01158                 /* Are we finished? */
01159                 done = (rc != CYAML_ERROR_NONE ||
01160                         token.type == YAML_STREAM_END_TOKEN ||
01161                         token.type == YAML_NO_TOKEN);
01162 
01163                 token_type = token.type;
01164 
01165                 yaml_token_delete(&token);
01166         }
01167 
01168         /* Destroy the Parser object. */
01169         yaml_parser_delete(&parser);
01170 
01171         if (input != NULL)
01172                 fclose(input);
01173 
01174         if (token_type == YAML_STREAM_END_TOKEN &&
01175             rc == CYAML_ERROR_NONE)
01176                 return tree.root;
01177 
01178         cYAML_free_tree(tree.root);
01179 
01180         return NULL;
01181 }
